mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Will forward Mosley's letter and that of Gov. Tompkins to General Dearborne with recommendation of his immediate attention; cannot give orders to heads of departments but can only make recommendations to them; Dearborne should reply to Mosley within three weeks.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Tompkins, Daniel D., 1774-1825
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1808 September 2, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to George Mosley, n.p.
